author: brucexu
content:
Hey guys, not sure if it's appropriate to share this here — https://x.com/LXDAO_Official/status/1929276575570149491 — but I could really use your help.

We're trying to bring more attention to EIP-7702 and encourage people to build on it and experiment with its new features. After the event, the GitHub repo will serve as a valuable educational resource, with documentation, project ideas, examples, and demos all in one place.

If you have suggestions, want to contribute, or know someone who might be interested, please share this with them or help us spread the word. Thanks so much!
